description: Enjoy a walk around this expansive woodland area near the village of Bawtry in Yorkshire. The walk starts in the town and follows Martin Lane north west through the countryside to reach the woods. Here you can follow a number of tracks through the peaceful woods and look out for a variety of flora and fauna. You can continue your walking in the area by heading north to pick up the Doncaster Circular Walk at neighbouring Rossington. Please scroll down for the full list of walks near and around Bawtry. The detailed maps below also show a range of footpaths, bridleways and cycle paths in the area.

details.subtitle: Pubs/Cafes
details.content: The Ship is a nice place for some post walk refreshments. They serve good quality home-cooked food at reasonable prices. There is also a garden area to sit out in on warmer days. You can find them on Gainsborough Road at postcode DN10 6HT.

details.subtitle: Dog Walking
details.content: The woods are a fine place for a dog walk. The Ship mentioned above is also dog friendly.

display_address: Top Street, Bawtry, Doncaster, South Yorkshire, England, DN10 6TF, United Kingdom
